1421990.name: 141 Demo
1421990.description:
An Eye For An Eye.

Sometime in the near future, 7 leaders from 7 urban tribes engage in worldwide deadly shootouts.
The objective: Get the encrypted data back to the source.
Find the encrypted KEY and activate the data SLOT, a pyramidal dock with the power of sending the data back to ATMOS.
If eliminated, you will drop the key.

Take the fight to a rainy forest, a hi-tech station, or in the crumbling slums of an old town.
Play Solo or Join a Team and split the rewards with your teammates every time you complete a mission.



The SR77.

An advanced modular weapon that morphs to suit your needs just like a swiss army knife.
Strap on a large caliber barrel and high precision scope for long-range, or equip a front grip and short muzzle for close-quarters combat.
Find chips in the field that switch the SR77 from a fast submachine gun to a silent bow, sniper rifles, or even powerful fire and grenade launchers.
You are allowed to carry 4 chips in battle so make the best use of them.
It's all about your strategy.

As you complete missions, your warriors improve with you.
With each completed mission they receive points for speed, strength, focus, and resistance.

Main Features:

  • Competitive Matches - Worldwide Matches (6/12 Players, SOLO and TEAM)
  • 4 Game Modes - Data Extraction: All players must find the same key and deliver it at the objective location - Last One: Survival mode, last player alive wins the match - Classic Deathmatch: 25 Kill deathmatch - Duel: One versus One in a five-round match.
  • Tactical Versatility - Upgrade a single weapon with extensive upgrades that drastically change the way you play
  • 4 Maps - The Forest, Old Town, Lost Station and Snow Zone.
  • Character Progression - Build up your warrior´s stats and watch them become stronger, faster, and deadlier every match.
  • Tribes - Create or Join a Tribe, send and receive invitations, promote and demote members.
  • Low-Lag - Worldwide low latency servers.
